title: 9/8 - 9/11 Homework
content:
Literature:  None Language Arts:  Language Network Textbook Pgs. 22A, 24A, Chapter 1 Grammar Test Wednesday History:  How did Roman Catholic Church influence the daily lives of the people during Middle Ages?  Explain in 10 or more sentences.
Bonus: What is excommunication?  Explain in 3 or more sentences.
